name: Bounty Hunting Time
description:
Bounty Hunting Time is an action roguelite where you play one of the game's characters where you can choose two of your own crew members and fight against hordes of monsters. and earn powers to improve your team In order to prepare for the boss battle. After the battle is over when you return to the Hunter Tavern. You can find new teammates. Develop your favorite character. to prepare for the next round of fighting


Features
-9 characters that the player can unlock to play. and will be added in the future
-4 bosses and more will be added in the future.
-Rune system to make characters stronger
-Eating system before hunting Helps the character become better in that round.
-Equipped with artifacts that drop from playing in stages
